About Me.

I am a Lithuanian Shopify Developer, who focuses on enhancing clients store's speed.

  • My Skills Are: Liquid, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Git & GitHub.
Contact Me

How it Works.

1. Analysis

I will analyze your Shopify store using tools like GTmetrix and Lighthouse. This will allow me to identify performance issues, such as slow loading times, unoptimized images.

2. Optimization

Keep your Shopify store running efficiently with ongoing updates, troubleshooting, and performance monitoring.

3. Testing

Based on the analysis, I will optimize your Shopify store. This includes compressing images, optimizing theme files, minifying CSS and JavaScript, and improving overall site speed.

4. Reporting

I will provide a detailed report showing the improvements made to your Shopify store, including before-and-after performance metrics.
